description:
Ganpi`s Scizor battled against Diantha`s Gardevoir in a significant battle in a large stadium but little details about the nature of the actual battle are known. It has been seen Mega Evolving into Mega Scizor where it lost the battle against Diantha`s Gardevoir.
None of its moves are confirmed as there was no dialog during that scene.
name: Hassam (Ganpi)
